workExperiences.description: I built an infrastructure logging system to monitor devex quality. I designed as well quality evaluation metrics.
I contributed to a major ongoing migration of complex components inside the Search experience by migrating one of the experiences; cleaned it up, refactored it, and optimized it.

I collaborated with a team to develop a full stack desktop app using ElectronJS. The app aimed to facillitate cooperation between developers and other remote workers. I worked on integrating the frontend with the backend, as well as improved user experience.
I contributed to the technical and visual design of a mental wellness mobile app using React Native.
I conducted in-depth analysis of modern attack models and attribution tools, with a focus on induced graph techniques, to uncover new insights and improve cyber defense strategies.
I assist students with class assignments, lead study sessions, hold office hours, grade exams, and provide feedback to improve understanding surrounding data structures and algorithms.
I built a group portfolio with Javascript and SCSS through Jekyll and Ruby and a weather app using ReactJS and OpenWeatherMap API and GeoDB API to retrieve forecast and geolocation.

I worked along Google engineers to learn web development and build an end-to-end application focused on promoting mental health and battling Impostor Syndrome for college students and minorities by monitoring their day-to-day emotional state and providing tips.
